mapper.select: select cd.field_name "field_name", dm.dime_name "dime_name" from usertool_ys.dap_uni_cube_dime cd left join usertool_ys.dap_uni_dime_metadata dm on cd.dime_id = dm.dime_id where cd.cube_id = #{cube_id}

select t.class_id "dime_class_id", t.class_name "dime_class_name" from usertool_ys.dap_uni_metadata_class t where t.cube_id = #{cube_id} and t.class_type='0' and t.login_name = #{login_name} and t.tenant_id = #{tenant_id}
select t.class_id "dime_class_id", t.class_name "dime_class_name" from usertool_ys.dap_uni_metadata_class t where t.parent_class_id = #{parent_class_id} and t.tenant_id = #{tenant_id}

select cd.dime_id "dime_id", dm.dime_name "dime_name", dm.dime_class_id "dime_class_id", dm.dime_table "dime_table", dm.show_limit_sql "show_limit_sql", cd.field_name "field_name" from usertool_ys.dap_uni_cube_dime cd left join usertool_ys.dap_uni_dime_metadata dm on cd.dime_id = dm.dime_id where cd.cube_id = #{cube_id} and dm.dime_id in(select dime_id from usertool_ys.dap_uni_mc_dime where class_id=#{dime_class_id})

select cd.measure_id "measure_id", dm.measure_name "measure_name", dm.measure_class_id "measure_class_id", cd.field_name "field_name" from usertool_ys.dap_uni_cube_measure cd left join usertool_ys.dap_uni_measure_metadata dm on cd.measure_id = dm.measure_id where cd.cube_id = #{cube_id} and dm.measure_id in(select measure_id from usertool_ys.dap_uni_mc_measure where class_id=#{dime_class_id})
select distinct dm.show_limit_sql from usertool_ys.dap_uni_cube_dime cd left join usertool_ys.dap_uni_dime_metadata dm on cd.dime_id = dm.dime_id where cd.field_name=#{field_name}
